snippet: A minute-by-minute analysis of Brad Keselowski’s tweeting during the Daytona 500 on Monday night showed that his following grew steadily, rather than explosively.
lead_paragraph: A minute-by-minute analysis of Brad Keselowski’s tweeting during the Daytona 500 on Monday night showed that his following grew steadily, rather than explosively.

headline.seo: For Keselowski, a Steady Climb on Twitter
